title: 11-year-old cross-examined by father in Florida murder trial
description: Ronnie Oneal, a man in Tampa, Florida, accused of killing his wife and daughter and attempting to kill his son, is serving as his own attorney in his murder trial.

title: Medieval Europeans regularly reopened graves — and not to rob them
description: Early Medieval graves in Europe were reopened as part of widespread burial tradition — not only by grave robbers, as experts previously thought.

title: Fact-check: Fox News and Republican lawmakers push new false flag conspiracy that FBI orchestrated US Capitol attack
description: Fox News, right-wing websites and Republican lawmakers are promoting a new false flag conspiracy that the FBI orchestrated the deadly assault on the US Capitol.

title: 'House from hell' listed for $600,000 gets multiple all-cash offers
description: If there were ever a time to sell a house of horrors, the time is now.

title: IDF strikes Gaza for second time this week
description: The Israeli military struck targets in Gaza for the second time this week, the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) said in a statement, after a continued barrage of incendiary balloons sparked eight fires in southern Israel.

title: CNN anchor: This is one of the most embarrassing failures for ICC
description: Former Ivory Coast President Laurent Gbagbo returns to the country after 10 years in exile, following an acquittal from the International Criminal Court. He had been on trial for violence in the country following his refusal to concede in the 2010 elections. Professor Phil Clark of the SOAS University of London speaks to CNN's Zain Asher about the case and the challenges the ICC faces.

title: Naomi Osaka will miss Wimbledon but plans on Tokyo Olympics return
Osaka joins Nadal in pulling out of Wimbledon
Someone is breaking the wings of pelicans in California
description: Dozens of brown pelicans have been attacked and injured in California, with whoever is responsible snapping some of the birds' wings.

title: Right now in Iceland: Hot lava and a warm welcome
description: Just a 25-minute car ride from Iceland's Keflavik International Airport, a hiking trail winds over two miles to a view of what's quite possibly the greatest show on Earth right now.

title: Jan. 6 rioter charged with bringing gun to Capitol grounds, undercutting GOP claims of unarmed mob
description: The Justice Department on Thursday charged a US Capitol rioter with bringing a handgun onto Capitol grounds -- two days after a hearing where Republican lawmakers downplayed the deadly attack and claimed the pro-Trump rioters were unarmed.

title: Toddler on a feeding tube after swallowing magnetic balls
description: A two-year-old boy in Florida is on a feeding tube after doctors had to remove 16 magnetic balls from his digestive tract.

title: CDC lowers warning level for cruise travel
description: Health officials in the United States have eased their stance on the safety of cruise travel for vaccinated passengers, lowering the travel alert level just over a week before the first cruise in more than 15 months is scheduled to set sail from a US port.

title: 'It is obscene,' Chimamanda Adichie says in new essay on social media cancel culture
description: Acclaimed Nigerian author and feminist Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie has published a reflective essay on young people on social media "who are choking on sanctimony and lacking in compassion."

title: One of the world's largest diamonds has been unearthed in Botswana
description: One of the world's largest diamonds has been unearthed in Botswana, the country's government has announced.

title: New tech gives surgeons 'superpowers'
description: A new medical device collaboration is giving surgeons "x-ray vision," by fusing digitally enhanced images directly into the microscope of a surgical device.

title: As a scientist, I want to believe in UFOs, but ...
description: "The Truth is Out There" is the tagline for "The X-Files," the Fox Network television show that aired during the 1990s. It explored the paranormal and unexplained, but to a very large degree, it focused on the idea that not only does extraterrestrial life exist, but it has repeatedly visited Earth.

title: Denmark star Christian Eriksen to be fitted with heart starter
description: Christian Eriksen is to be fitted with an implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD), the Danish national football association announced Thursday, following the midfielder's collapse on the field at Euro 2020.

title: Why everyone is talking about golf's new rivalry
description: It began with a look of pure annoyance and frustration, spiraled into a meme and then a beer company got involved. Yes, everybody is talking about the ongoing spat between golfers Brooks Koepka and Bryson DeChambeau.

title: Get vaccinated here and get a free chicken
description: Live chickens are being given away by local authorities in rural Indonesia as an incentive for older residents to get vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: Hong Kong police declare newsroom a crime scene as editors and executives arrested
description: Hong Kong police have arrested executives and top editors working for the pro-democracy newspaper Apple Daily under the city's national security law.

title: Years after racial upset, Dolce & Gabbana is still struggling to win back China
description: Chinese consumers have neither forgiven nor forgotten Dolce & Gabbana.

title: Philippines plans to double its limit on health care workers deployed overseas
description: The Philippines' labor minister said on Wednesday he will ask for government approval to allow 5,000 more health care workers to be deployed abroad, double the annual cap in a country that is one of the world's biggest sources of nurses.

title: Malaysia court overturns inquest's misadventure verdict on Irish teen's death
description: A Malaysian court on Wednesday overturned a lower court's finding that an Irish teenager had died by misadventure after vanishing in the jungle, saying an open verdict should have been recorded instead.

title: Carlson promotes baseless conspiracy that FBI planned Capitol riot
description: Fox News host Tucker Carlson is promoting a new baseless conspiracy theory that the FBI planned the attack on the Capitol on Jan. 6. CNN's Brian Stelter has more.

title: South Korea citizenship law change proposal sparks anti-China backlash
description: South Korea is trying to increase its future working population by making it easier for children of foreign residents to become citizens, but its plans have run into trouble in the face of rising anti-China sentiment.

title: Junta troops burn Myanmar village to the ground after fighting, residents say
description: Security forces set ablaze a village in central Myanmar after clashing there with opponents of the ruling junta, leaving at least two elderly people burned to death, several village residents said on Wednesday.

title: China successfully launches mission sending astronauts to new space station
description: China successfully launched three astronauts into space on Thursday, bringing the country one step closer to completing its new space station.

title: New images help solve mystery of Betelgeuse's great dimming
description: Betelgeuse, a bright star visible in the Orion constellation in the night sky, has beguiled and puzzled space scientists since late 2019.

title: South Carolina court halts executions until the state's new firing squad option is finalized
description: The South Carolina Supreme Court on Wednesday halted executions in the state until procedures for its newest method of execution -- firing squad -- are finalized.

title: Here are the 14 House Republicans who voted against a bill making Juneteenth a federal holiday
description: The House overwhelmingly passed a bill on Wednesday that would establish June 19 as Juneteenth National Independence Day, a US federal holiday commemorating the end of slavery in the United States.

title: Vaccine-hesitant patient: If I could do it all over again, I'd get it
description: Families are mourning loved ones who died of coronavirus after being hesitant to get the Covid-19 vaccine. CNN's Ed Lavandera reports.

title: Chaotic scene at joint photo op seems to crack up Biden
description: Watch all the shoving, yelling and mayhem at the Biden-Putin photo op. CNN's Jeanne Moos sums up the summit chaos.

title: US and allies are pushing China and Russia closer together, but will their 'unbreakable friendship' last?
description: Editor's note: CNN will be launching the Meanwhile in China newsletter on June 21, a three-times-a-week update exploring what you need to know about the country's rise and how it impacts the world. Sign up here.

title: Cases of a dangerous Covid-19 variant are 'rapidly increasing' in US, expert says
description: As US states lift more coronavirus restrictions, experts are worried people who aren't fully vaccinated could contribute to further spread of the virus.
